casebody.data:
The State ex rel. McDonald v. Pfeiffer, Admr.; Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. McDonald v. Pfeiffer (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 131.]

(No. 96-2189 Submitted July 8, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Cox & Stein and Edward J. Cox, Jr., for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Dennis L. Hufstader, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

*132The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court, of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
